vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_dncstart2(unsigned short FlibHndl, char *filename);

cmn.p: This function returns whether DNC operation or M198 operation is being executed or not.

This function returns EW_OK in case that DNC operation or M198 operation are started. If a return value is EW_OK at M198 operation, this function returns a program number/program name demanded from CNC, instead at DNC operation, NULL is returned for the program number/program name.
Also, if a return value is EW_OK, it become possible to output the program of DNC operation or M198 operation by a function cnc_dnc2
This function returns EW_REJECT in case that DNC operation or M198 operation has not been started.

The following functions will return EW_FUNC in case that cnc_dncstart2 function is not executed.
cnc_dnc2
cnc_dncend2
A basic procedure for DNC operation or M198 operation is shown below.

tr.td: This function is not available to Embedded Ethernet.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
The pointer of the area where the NC program number/program name will be set by CNC.

In order to get the program number for operation, at least 16 bytes area is required.
Otherwise, the result of this function is not predictable.

In order to get the program name for operation, at least 64 bytes area is required.
Otherwise, the result of this function is not predictable.
Program number/program name is set as ASCII code with NULL terminated at this area.

tr.td: In case that 'O1234' was designated as the program number, the following character string is set to 'filename'.
In case that 'GEAR_PARTS_001' was designated as the program name, the following character string is set to 'filename'.

content.p: The NULL string is set as the program number/program name in case of DNC operation, and the character string that shows the program number/program name in case of M198 operation.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
cnc_dncstart2 function has been executed.
Terminate DNC operation by using cnc_dncend2 function.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The extended driver/library function is necessary.

item.name: EW_PARAM
item.content:
CNC parameter error
The following CNC parameter must be set.
Series 15/15i
7713#0 = 1
Series 16/18, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B/C
8706#1 = 1

item.name: EW_REJECT
item.content: DNC or M198 operation is not started.

item.name: EW_BUSY
item.content:
Busy
cnc_dncstart2 function has been executed.
Terminate DNC operation by using cnc_dncend2 function.

item.name: EW_REJECT
item.content: DNC or M198 operation is not started.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
The extended driver/library function is necessary.

option.hssb: The extended driver/library function is necessary.

ethr.p: The Ethernet function and the extended driver/library function are necessary.
However, in case of Series 16i/18i/21i-B, 0i-B/C/D, Series 30i and PMi-A, the required CNC option is as follows.

p.ul: above two optional functions are not required.

ul.ul:
Series 15 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
7713#0 = 1 (must be set)
0020 = 15 (must be set)
Series 15i 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
0020 = 15 (must be set)
Series 16/18/21, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
8706#0 (influenced by setting) (This parameter is effective only in path 1. Set 0 except the 1st path.)
8706#1 = 1 (must be set)
0020 = 15 (must be set)
0020 = 16 (must be set)(In case of HSSB PORT2 function)
Series 30i/31i/32i, 0i-D, PMi-A 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
0020 = 15 (must be set)
0020 = 16 (must be set)(In case of HSSB PORT2 function and NCGuidePro)

Series 15i 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
0020 = 6 (must be set)
Series 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i/31i/32i, PMi-A 0000#0 (influenced by setting)
0020 = 6 (must be set)

Series 15 It is necessary to be set in TAPE mode.
Series 15i It is necessary to be set in DNC mode.
Series 16/18, 16i/18i/21i, 0i-A/B It is necessary to be set in MEM mode, and "DMMC" signal(DI), G042#7=1 in case of DNC operation.
Series 30i/31i/32i, Series 0i-D, PMi-A, 16i/18i/21i(In case of HSSB PORT2 function) It is necessary to be set in MEM mode, and "DNCI" signal(DI), G043#5=1 in case of DNC operation.

Series 15i It is necessary to be set in DNC mode.
Series 16i/18i/21i, 0i, 30i/31i/32i, PMi-A It is necessary to be set in MEM mode, and "DNCI" signal(DI), G043#5=1 in case of DNC operation.

is_mode.cmn: It is necessary to be set in MEM mode, and "DNCI" signal(DI), G043#5=1 in case of DNC operation.
